channel.title: jimgrisham tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from jimgrisham.

item.description: @ClaraJeffery There are a few Rick Steves podcast episodes you can probably force upon the kid while in the car before you go…
@severedDatahead @SilvermanJacob Non-exhaust vent hoods should be phased out ASAP!

@ArcheoAstro @JENinthePM @v21 @SilvermanJacob Are there adapters than can turn an induction ‘burner’ into a more conventional/thermal one? (i.e. A ‘ferrous core’ disc that sits on top, and gets hot itself and onto which a purely aluminum pan could be placed to heat via conductive heat transfer.)

@SilvermanJacob I didn’t see it in the article, but is there data regarding indoor air when gas cooking appliances are used with outdoor air exhaust vs without? Instead of a binary choice, might an “always run your exhaust fan whilst cooking” public health campaign improve near-term outcomes?
@ArousedAcorn @TheFeenMachine_ @ndrew_lawrence … based solely on the background color, that chart _may_ be from the Financial Times (@FT)??
@ziegenfusscw @janthonylong @KitCase3 @asymmetricinfo Yup. It sucks, but nearly every society takes advantage of (or at least neglects) the poor.
@janthonylong @ziegenfusscw @KitCase3 @asymmetricinfo “Alexa, add 2 TLAMs and a reconditioned W87 to my cart.”

@ziegenfusscw @janthonylong @KitCase3 @asymmetricinfo Right to an attorney in criminal trials? Right to a speedy trial? Freedom against unreasonable search and seizure? Freedom of assembly? Freedom of speech? Right to vote? Equal protection of the law? …
@ziegenfusscw @asymmetricinfo If there is someone / something to blame, it’s already too late.
@ziegenfusscw @asymmetricinfo … but most importantly, this has distracted people from focusing on the guns.
@gauravjohri @Nick_Solari Since the ship isn’t solid steel, simplistic comparisons are difficult. Alternatively, detailed FEM analysis would require hours / days (or longer) of supercomputer time.
@HSPAbWGI @LiberalsStink2 @medmarijuanabiz @BillWeirCNN .. also, they fire rounds less likely to penetrate cinder-block walls intact.

@jmhaigh @Nrg8000 @keyavakil According to a news broadcast this evening, they are part time unit comprised of about a third of the 30-ish officers in the town and primarily are used for serving drug warrants.
@jeremyzorek That’s the one with the huge old cable car pulley (found during excavations) on display?
@katie_panda @Foone @jmetal88 There were probably not too many people focused on gadgets less than 2 weeks after 9/11…
@nicnowak @Foone … and probably most audiences capacity limits for vacation-related slideshows at holiday parties. It basically replaces the old carousel slide projector.
@PatriotQuarter @BeauTFC @bentaylor42 … even cheaper when you order them on a buy-now-pay-later plan, (especially if you know you’re not going to be around for the ‘pay later’ part).
@michaeljacobsa @leeferran Montana _is_ pretty darn awesome.
@DirkSchwenk @ChrisO_wiki @TrentTelenko They surely have their top men maintaining those. Top men.
@luke_dawgfan @ChrisO_wiki Too bad they couldn’t annex Afghanistan…
